sub_title: Product Owner | Project Management | Digital Transformation
summary:
Experienced professional with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry across various domains and Industry sectors. . Effective leader with exceptional inter-personal skills. Skilled in SAP ERP, Project Delivery, Scaled Agile, Agile methodologies.
Have been part of Digital and Automation journeys at many of my last engagements. Delivered various automation solutions working in Scaled Agile methodology at enterprises.  
Well versed with Contract Management, requirement gathering,  resource mapping, and for timely deliveries. I possess sound knowledge in Data Gathering, Information Retrieval, Process Improvement, Process Documentation, Performance Management, Competency Mapping and Team Coordination while being adept at strategic planning to overcome project-planning blockages.
Results-oriented team leader, who balances big picture thinking with excellent organizational & delegation skills, empowers staff with the tools and autonomy to meet performance expectations and organisational goals. Thrives in dynamic, growth oriented environments that demand initiative, resourcefulness and flexibility. Successfully working with cross-functional team environments, clients& employees from diversified backgrounds & geographies including US, Europe and Asia.

profile_positions.description:
•	Functioning as system analyst at Volkswagen’s Genuine Spare Parts division in Kassel, Germany
•	Process and System Architect for the product development (SAFe) of SAP EWM solutions for VW Genuine Part importers in multiple geographies and roll-out strategies version-dependent
•	Responsible for managing SAP Upgrades at various importers worldwide including Germany (AP, NA, EU, DE)
•	Delivery of SAP business solutions to VW Genuine parts’ importers  
•	Architect for legal requirement of GDPR compliance project
•	Rollout of GDPR project to all the Genuine Parts importers (AP, NA, EU, DE)
profile_positions.title: System Analyst

profile_positions.description:
•	Technical Product Owner for one of the Platform Development Teams (PDTs) at Vanderlande Industries, Veghel
•	Vanderlande is a market-leading, global partner for future-proof logistics process automation in warehousing, airports and parcel services. A Generic Warehouse Platform is future-proof automated warehouse solutions for renowned customers worldwide
•	Worked on building software for a Warehouse platform intended for future-proof automated warehouse solutions focusing on retail customers
•	Developed UI applications to govern warehouse operations with eye-on-glass monitoring, and empowered users to take proactive or reactive actions based on the real-time data-driven analytics  
•	Vision of Improved operational efficiency and reduction in operational delays using ‘smart’ alert notifications 
•	Worked and coordinated with multiple (16) PDTs on microservices architecture to deliver Warehouse Platform features
•	Built modern and intuitive User Interfaces for warehouse operations catering to the requirements of multiple retail customers
•	Build performant UI applications, and its lifecycle management 
•	E2E system integrations and automated deployments 
•	Iteratively include the selective warehouse functions and expand the UI scope to increase coverage of warehouse operations
profile_positions.title: Product Owner

profile_positions.description:
Product Owner
•	Responsible for implementation of our AI based automation product for EU customers with customer recognized business value benefits
•	Activities include driving digital transformation of the IT Enterprise powered by AI and Machine Learning for improved customer experience and business assurance.
•	Set up the priorities for the product increment within ART and overseeing the development stages. Coordinating with CPO to define the Smart PI objectives and tracking the commitments through various sprint ceremonies. 
•	Responsible for the product vision and maintaining the backlog and prioritizing the needs through continuous dialog with stakeholders/customers 
•	Evaluation of product progress at each iteration and participate effectively in the ART and PO syncs to get the required help within and outside the ART
•	Identified new opportunities by focusing on customer requirements and worked closely with CoE
•	Work closely with Customer stake holders and ensure the risks are informed and handled effectively
•	Implemented many automation usecases for Infra, Applications, Digital Workplace/End user computing area in the roadmap of “Infra Automation” ART.
•	Team management with maintaining of a diverse and effective workforce
Implementation Lead
•	Worked with the Product/Project Managers to define the roadmap for any given product and translate this into user stories
•	Identified new opportunities by focusing on customer requirements and worked closely with Center of Excellence team to provide and upsell the solutions.
•	Agree points of interaction and escalation with the client, ensuring the product delivery according to the Contract
•	Identify areas of improvement. Define and track Continuous Improvement Plans (CIPs)
•	Liaise with Product Engineering, Pre-Sales and Delivery team to ensure smooth implementation to meet the greed deadlines
•	Governance of the LIVE projects through monthly Streeing Committee connects and weekly/monthly status reports
profile_positions.title: Product Owner @ASML

profile_positions.description:
-Handling IT projects in Volkswagen India Pvt ltd., 
-Managing support as well as Business driven Implementations projects for the customer and key user.
-Look after IT requirements for Logistics and Warehouse
-Estimation, and Administration of the IT developments
- Delivered projects and products using the appropriate agile and other project management methodologies, learning & iterating frequently
- Lead the collaborative, dynamic planning process – prioritized the work that needs to be done against the capacity and capability of the team.
- Identified resources requirements, engage and assign individual responsibilities.
- Managed day-to-day operational aspects of a project within a defined scope
- Proactively manage risks and mitigation avoiding project delays.
- Participated engagement reviews and quality assurance procedures.
- Ensures project documents are complete, current, and stored appropriately in the document repository.
- Managed Stakeholders through working groups and steering committees.
- Managed and negotiate with Vendor consortium in projects. Strong communication skills and relationships used to manage suppliers effectively.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager
